backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (Employee, JobRole, LeaveEntry, Task, Payslip, etc.) and initializing stable maps and counters for an HR management system with authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades OldEmployee records (lacking jobTitle, department, email) and OldPayslip records to their new shapes by mapping over stored data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking four employee-creation features (form submission, field validation, list refresh, success toast) to their implementing files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing component responsibilities and UI behavior across the application.
frontend/BUILDING.md: Minimal markdown document with a heading for build and deployment instructions; content is empty beyond the title.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root TanStack Router configuration declaring all application routes including public pages, HR dashboard sub-routes, and the employee dashboard route guarded by EmployeeProtectedRoute.
frontend/src/components/animations/Hover: A simple wrapper component that applies a CSS hover-triggered slide-in animation to its children with an optional delay.
frontend/src/components/animations/Slide: Wraps children in a span that triggers a slide-in-right animation once the element enters the viewport, using the useInView hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays a full-screen access denied card with either a login prompt or a return-to-home button depending on whether the reason is unauthenticated or unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminProtec: Guards a route by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing a loading spinner or AccessDeniedScreen as appropriate before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/EmployeePro: Guards a route by verifying the user is authenticated and associated with an employee record, rendering AccessDeniedScreen for unauthenticated or non-employee users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: A button component that triggers Internet Identity login or logout, showing a spinner during the login process and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal dialog that appears for authenticated users who have no profile, prompting them to enter a name and email to create one via the saveMutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: A basic route guard that shows a loading spinner while Internet Identity initializes and renders AccessDeniedScreen if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: A route guard identical in structure to ProtectedRoute that blocks unauthenticated users with AccessDeniedScreen while the identity initializes.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: A contact form with name, email, and message fields that submits data via the useSubmitContactMessage mutation and displays success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactM: Renders a sorted list of contact messages as cards, displaying sender name, email, timestamp, message body, and a read/new status badge.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactS: Displays a full contact section with an animated layout containing a contact form card and a contact information card with email, phone, and address details.
frontend/src/components/employee/MyLeave: Shows an employee's leave balance summary cards and a table of their leave history with status badges, with a loading spinner while data is fetching.
frontend/src/components/employee/MyTasks: Renders a list of tasks assigned to the current employee, showing title, description, priority badge, due date, and completion status.
frontend/src/components/employee/TimeOff: A form component for employees to submit time-off requests with start/end date, leave type, and reason fields, using a mutation hook to persist the request.
frontend/src/components/employees/Employ: A form for creating a new employee or updating an existing employee's salary, with client-side validation and mutation hooks for both operations.
Renders a responsive table of employees showing name, joining date, base salary, and leave balance, with action buttons to navigate to detail, tasks, salary, and payslip pages.
frontend/src/components/jobroles/JobRole: A form component for creating new job roles with fields for title, city, country, description, and LinkedIn URL, using the useCreateJobRole mutation and displaying toast notifications on success or failure.
A table component that displays a list of job roles with their title, location, open/closed status badge, and a LinkedIn external link button.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipCard.t: Reusable card component rendering a leadership team member's avatar icon, name, title, and description with gradient styling and hover shadow animation.
frontend/src/components/leaves/LeaveEntr: A panel component that shows an employee's leave entries in a table with a total leave count summary, and includes a dialog for adding new leave entries via LeaveEntryForm.
A form component for adding a leave entry with start date, end date, and reason fields, converting dates to nanosecond timestamps before submitting via the useAddLeaveEntry mutation.
frontend/src/components/nav/FadeNavLabel: A simple wrapper span component that applies a fade-in animation and hover opacity transition to navigation labels, with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileMenuTo: An animated hamburger/close icon component for mobile menus that transitions between three horizontal lines and an X shape, with fallback rendering for reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/payslips/Payslip: A list component that displays payslips sorted by most recent, showing month/year, generation date, and final payable amount, with a download button that triggers PDF generation via downloadPayslip.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Defines the public-facing layout with a sticky header, desktop/mobile navigation links, smooth-scroll section handling, and an Outlet for child routes. Conditionally shows an Employee Dashboard link if the user is an associated employee.
frontend/src/components/salary/SalaryBre: A card component that displays an employee's salary breakdown including base salary, bonus, PF deduction, and final payable amount with color-coded values.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Renders an expandable card for a single service, showing its icon, description, and key features on expand, with Quick View, Learn More, and optional Compliance First action buttons.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: A dialog modal that shows a quick overview of a service's icon, title, description, and key features, with navigation buttons to view full details or the compliance-first page.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EmployeeMu: A multi-select component for choosing employees, featuring a searchable list with checkboxes and badge display of selected employees with remove capability.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: A dialog form component for creating and editing tasks, handling fields like title, description, due date, priority, assigned employees, and completion status.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TasksTable: A table component that displays tasks with columns for title, due date, priority, assigned employees, and status, with edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/data/services.ts: Defines and exports a static array of HR service offerings (HR Consulting, Payroll, Compliance, Recruitment) with metadata and a helper to look up a service by slug.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapError.ts: A stub hook that previously handled admin bootstrap errors but now simply returns a null error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplianceFirstFee: A hook that fetches compliance and legal news articles from The Guardian API and returns them via React Query with a 5-minute cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: A hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track whether a referenced DOM element is visible in the viewport, with configurable threshold, margin, and trigger-once options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor interactions including user profiles, roles, employees, leave, tasks, payslips, and contact messages. Exports typed query and mutation hooks wrapping the ICP actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTailoredSolutionsF: Fetches HR/business articles from The Guardian API and exposes them via a React Query hook. Returns typed article objects with title, description, URL, source, and date.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet using Tailwind with custom CSS variables for a dark-themed design system including colors, sidebar, and chart tokens. Also defines base typography, focus styles, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Mounts the App component into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page displaying the company's mission, values (Excellence, Integrity, Innovation), and a leadership team section using Card and LeadershipCard components.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceFirstPage.t: Page that fetches and displays compliance/legal news articles in a responsive grid using the useComplianceFirstFeed hook, with loading, error, and empty states handled.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Simple Contact page that renders the ContactSection component with business hours visible and title/description hidden.
frontend/src/pages/employee/EmployeeDash: Employee self-service dashboard with tabbed sections for profile, tasks, payslips, time-off requests, and leave summary, fetching data via multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Employee relaxation page displaying a grid of clickable game cards (Subway Surfers, Chess, Ludo, etc.) that open Poki game links in a new tab.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main landing page featuring a hero section with animated headline, about/services/recruitment/contact sections, and a service quick-view modal with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/pages/hr/AccessManagementPa: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/pages/hr/ContactMessagesPag: Placeholder HR page for viewing contact form submissions, displaying a stub UI indicating the feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeeDetailPage: HR page showing a single employee's details across Overview, Leave Management, and Edit tabs, fetched by employee ID from route params.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeesPage.tsx: HR employee directory page with search filtering, a table of all employees, and a dialog for creating new employees.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrEmployeePayslips: HR page for viewing and generating payslips for a specific employee, with a dialog to select month/year for payslip generation.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrEmployeeSalaryPa: HR page displaying the salary breakdown for a specific employee using the SalaryBreakdownCard component.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrEmployeeTasksPag: HR page listing all tasks assigned to a specific employee, showing title, description, priority badge, and completion status.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrLayout.tsx: Defines the HR dashboard layout with a sticky header, slide-out navigation menu (Sheet), links to HR sub-pages, and a logout button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/hr/JobRolesPage.tsx: HR page for managing job roles, displaying a table of existing roles with loading skeletons and a dialog form to create new job postings.
frontend/src/pages/hr/QuickLeaveMarkPage: HR page providing a form to quickly mark a single-day leave for a selected employee, with fields for date, leave type, and reason.
frontend/src/pages/hr/TasksPage.tsx: HR page for task management that lists all tasks in a table and provides a dialog form to create new tasks, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/RecruitmentPage.tsx: Displays a list of open job roles fetched via a query hook, showing each role's title, location, description, and a LinkedIn link, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single service identified by URL slug, including its icon, description, and feature list, with navigation back to the services list.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all available HR services in a two-column grid using ServiceCard components and supports opening a quick-view modal for any selected service.
frontend/src/pages/TailoredSolutionsPage: Fetches and displays a grid of HR solution articles from a feed, handling loading, error, and empty states with retry functionality and staggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/pages/TeamPage.tsx: Renders a grid of three hardcoded team member cards with photos, roles, and descriptions, using scroll-triggered animations and hover effects on a dark background.
frontend/src/utils/deployDiagnostics.ts: Utility that collects and logs runtime deployment diagnostics (environment variables, canister IDs, build mode, identity status) to the browser console for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/utils/env.ts: Provides safe accessors for Vite environment variables via import.meta.env, including a helper to resolve the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Exports two formatting helpers: formatCurrency for INR currency strings and formatDate for converting nanosecond timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/navigateHome.ts: Utility function that handles navigation to the homepage, clearing URL hashes and smoothly scrolling to the top or the #home element depending on the current route.
frontend/src/utils/payslipDownload.ts: Generates a styled HTML payslip document from a Payslip object and employee name, then triggers a browser download of the resulting file.
frontend/src/utils/salary.ts: Calculates an employee's salary breakdown (base, bonus, PF deduction, leave deduction, final payable) from an Employee record.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Provides helpers to smoothly scroll to a page section by ID and to map navigation paths to their corresponding section IDs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH variables, border radius, fonts, shadows, animations) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for an Employee Management App tracking existing features, known issues (broken Create Employee form submission), and pending feature requests including Motoko backend updates and UI fixes.
